fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: We're interested in all initiatives that fit into these areas: borders and security; consumers; culture and media; social affairs; education; security policy; migration; human rights and others.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Human rights voice Lithuania is a non-governmental, non-profit organization that unites human rights activists that want to educate people on human rights issues, improve the understanding of specific issues of certain social groups and to encourage the growth of democratic institutions and organizations.
